Entries.Guitar_Gt1: %Denver is focused on his music. Best to leave him alone.
Entries.Guitar_Gt2: I need to practice a lot so that I don't get rusty.$h
Entries.Guitar_Gt3: Man, this kinda makes me miss my band days.

Entries.Guitar_Gt1: This is not my type of music... but it is fun to be part of a band.$1
Entries.Guitar_Gt2: What? I am sorry, I cannot hear you.$2
Entries.Guitar_Gt3: %Mike is caught up in the music.

Entries.Guitar_Gt1: %Juliet is really pounding the drums. It looks exhausting.
Entries.Guitar_Gt2: Hey @! This next song is for you!$1
Entries.Guitar_Gt3: @! Check this out! We're a band!$1

Entries.CommunityCenter: Good afternoon, my friend. Ah yes, they are noisy, but it is grand to hear such spirited enthusiasm.$1
